Description

Early Sun is an indie dev team comprised of George Urse and Munteanu Tiberiu, two childhood friends who used to mash buttons on nintendo's Ninja Turtles, dream of Tetris, and finish Contra daily.

History

We started making games because we love them. Sinus is our first project.
